question.text: How many items can be stored in the inventory?

answer.details: 27 stacks can be stored in the main inventory, 9 in the hotbar, 1 off-hand slot and 4 armour slots. Giving a potential maximum of 2372 individual items.

question.text: How many items can be stored in a double chest?

answer.details: 54 stacks of items works out as a total of 3456 individual items. Assuming all items can be stacked up to 64.

question.text: How fast can the player run?
What's the fastest form of travel over long distance?

answer.details: A thrown enderpearl has a chance of traveling up to slightly over 54 blocks, with a flight time of around 3 seconds. This gives a travel speed of 54 / 3 = ~18 blocks per second.

question.text: Which blocks are effected by gravity?

answer.details: TNT blocks won't fall until they are primed.

question.text: How do you drop a stack of items?

answer.details: You can also drop stacks by picking one up in the inventory screen and clicking outside the inventory window. Also exiting the inventory screen once a stack has been picked up will drop it.
